name: Flock (Ian Ouellette)
description:
Controls: Arrow keys to move.

This is a game I made in response to the prompt of making a game about crowds. You play as a bird, in a flock of identical birds. Being close to the middle of the flock makes you less comfortable, while being far away makes the other birds wary of you. The player has to balance the two, all while struggling to keep track of which bird they are.

And then, there's that hawk to worry about...
